attributes.comment:
PLEASE do not increase the rates for Biometrics (fingerprints) andthe I-600A. As
parents that are going throught the adoption process at this time we are on a very
tight budget to be able to afford this. People think that because you are adopting a
child you must be rich well that is not true. We have sacrificed very much to make
our dream of a child of our own come true. The expense is very high already and
with the current law that makes us have to renew both the fingerprints and the I-
600A already adding a higher fee is very hard for us to handle. Just remember that
if everyone had to go through what adoptive parents had to to have a child there
would be NO unwanted babies anywhere! Please Please do not raise these rates
for us.
Thank You!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Virginia Stevans
